versions.versionNotes: Initial version - Creates comprehensive processing recommendations

schema.prompt:
Create comprehensive processing recommendations from triage analysis:

Email Classifications: {{input.emailClassifications}}
Extracted Tasks: {{input.extractedTasks}}
Priority Analysis: {{input.priorityAnalysis}}
User Preferences: {{input.userPreferences}}

Generate comprehensive triage report:

1. Executive Summary:
   - Total emails processed
   - High priority items count
   - Action required items
   - Time estimates
   - Key deadlines

2. Priority Action Items:
   - Critical/urgent emails
   - Required responses
   - Time-sensitive tasks
   - Escalation needs
   - Immediate decisions

3. Processing Recommendations:
   - Quick wins (< 5 minutes)
   - Schedule blocks needed
   - Delegate opportunities
   - Research required
   - Follow-up actions

4. Time Management:
   - Total processing time
   - Suggested time blocks
   - Optimal scheduling
   - Batch processing
   - Efficiency tips

5. Task Organization:
   - Today's actions
   - This week's items
   - Future follow-ups
   - Archive candidates
   - Reference materials

6. Communication Plan:
   - Response templates
   - Priority order
   - Stakeholder updates
   - Meeting requests
   - Status communications

7. Workflow Optimization:
   - Pattern recognition
   - Automation opportunities
   - Template suggestions
   - Filter recommendations
   - Process improvements

8. Metrics & Insights:
   - Email volume trends
   - Response time analysis
   - Category breakdowns
   - Efficiency metrics
   - Improvement areas

Return as structured JSON with keys: executiveSummary (object), priorityActions (array), processingPlan (object), timeManagement (object), taskOrganization (object), communicationPlan (array), workflowOptimization (object), metrics (object).

props.placeholder: Output from email classifier with categorized emails...
Output from task extractor with identified action items...

translations.description: Creates comprehensive processing recommendations from email triage analysis
translations.instructions: Enter classified email data and extracted tasks. The system will generate a comprehensive report with processing recommendations and action plans.
translations.name: Triage Reporter
